code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es6",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "strict": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowUmdGlobalAccess": true
  },
  "include": ["./src/**/*.ts", "./src/**/*.tsx", "./src/**/*.json"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "build"]
}
